name: AgentFight
description:
I released a smart head action of old-fashioned face creative type.
· What is virtual button free?
As consumers' controllers get accustomed, they do not see them while playing, do they?
So you can be absorbed. I want to reproduce it on a smartphone!
By replacing common virtual attack buttons of common smartphone action with tap and swipe, stress-free operation not conscious of the virtual button was made possible.

Since you do not have to check the button position, pressing is delayed for a moment and eyes do not get tired.
It became a smart action that a little closer to consumer even in smartphone.

· Game play video
The movie is here.
https://youtu.be/i1egmQwEUdg

· With hack and slash elements
Items, weapons and armor can be dropped by the enemy, sold or bought.

· In addition to programs and effects, I also make songs all by myself, because I want to realize a fine commitment.
Although it is a maniac, I made it with the aim of a game like PS2 's urban rain which I loved.
We are considering adding player characters depending on popularity!
